info.title: SICON Gateway REST API
info.description: This API provides access to the gateway database and its adapters, devices and spawned errors.

NotFoundError.description: The required entity was not found

BadRequestError.description: The required entity was not found

Force.name: force
Force.description: Unlocks a locked process - use with caution

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: Defines how many items to fetch

Offset.name: offset
Offset.description: For pagination, define offset of items to fetch from

Properties.name: properties
Properties.description: Define which properties to include in each item. The format is comma separated.

Group.name: group
Group.description:
Define by what property to group the result by.
This makes the resulting items an object instead of an array.
If multiple properties are listed, the result is nest-grouped,
with each level down in the object mapping to the corresponding nth group parameter.

Filter.name: filter
Filter.description: Define a filter criteria based on fields and values

Grouping.name: grouping
Grouping.description: Get the data as nested object based on a built-in preset

Count.name: count
Count.description: Count the found items rather than returning the data objects

MainDeviceColumn.name: Column
MainDeviceColumn.description: Single column to fetch from IO_MainDevices table

MainDeviceConfigFileUploadBody.name: ConfigurationFile
MainDeviceConfigFileUploadBody.description: sdd or iodd config file for the MainDevice

ID.name: ID
ID.description: A unique ID identifying the item

AppID.name: AppID
AppID.description: A unique ID to identify an app

DataGroup.name: Group
DataGroup.description:
might have the following values according to the name of the tables in the databases:
* **DeviceControl**
* **ISDU**
* **ProcessData**
* **Reporting**

TimeRange.name: TimeRange
TimeRange.description:
**TimeRange** is a string with a character and a number `[x]` afterwards:
* `mi[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **minute/s** )
* `h[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **hour/s** )
* `d[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **day/s** )
* `w[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **weak/s** )
* `m[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **month/s** )
* `y[x]` ( get all entries within the last `x` **year/s** )
* all ( referring to all entries of the DB)

UniqueID.name: UniqueID
UniqueID.description: Consists of VendorID-DeviceID-Identifier. Where Identifier is either one of Serialnumber or Interface_Subinterface

ReportingRangeStart.name: rangeStart
ReportingRangeStart.description: Defines the start of the range to search for samples

ReportingRangeEnd.name: rangeEnd
ReportingRangeEnd.description: Defines the end of the range to search for samples

ReportingRangeType.name: rangeType
ReportingRangeType.description: Type of range to use with range

ReportingProperties.name: properties
ReportingProperties.description:
A list of properties to ask for. If empty, all properties will be returned
The list is comma separated. A list of properties can be retrieved via the ReportingConfig Table (not exposed via API)

ReportingSamples.name: samples
ReportingSamples.description:
Defines how many samples to return, evenly spreaded across the required `range`.
The default is `2`.

ReportingSource.name: source
ReportingSource.description:
Define from which sources the reporting data is aggregated from.
By default, all sources are used, but can be specified with a comma separated list.

tags.name: appCatalog
tags.description: Apps downloadable from the exa cloud

tags.name: app
tags.description: An app is a container pulled from the service.sicon.eco cloud registry

tags.name: device
tags.description: A device is an OT unit emitting ProcessData, Events and Reporting Data

tags.name: event
tags.description: Events are spawned by devices and have code, timestamp and severity

tags.name: floorplan
tags.description: A floor plan is an image to locate entitites upon via x and y coordinates relative to a refernece point in the left lower corner

tags.name: guidd
tags.description: A GUIDD is a device description file for the user interface

tags.name: hardware
tags.description: Subdevices and Maindevices merged in one view

tags.name: mainDevice
tags.description: Main devices allow to access mounted devices

tags.name: version
tags.description: Get version changelogs and single versions
